Package support

Class ParserXml

java.lang.Object
support.ParserXml
public class ParserXml extends Object
The ParserXml class is responsible for parsing worker data from an XML file. It uses the javax.xml.parsers library to read the XML file and extract the necessary data, and creates Worker objects with the extracted data.

      public ParserXml(String file)
      Constructs a new ParserXml object with the given file path.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • parseWorkersFromXML

      public List<Worker> parseWorkersFromXML()
      Parses worker data from the XML file specified in the file field. Returns a list of Worker objects with the parsed data.
      Returns:
      a list of Worker objects with the parsed data, or null if there is an error parsing the XML file.

    • getWorker

      private Worker getWorker(Node node) throws InputException
      Extracts worker data from the specified XML node and creates a new Worker object with the data.
      Parameters:
      node - the XML node containing the worker data.
      Returns:
      a new Worker object with the extracted data.
      Throws:
      InputException - if the extracted data is invalid.

    • getCoordinates

      private Coordinates getCoordinates(Element element) throws InputException
      Extracts Coordinates data from the specified XML element and creates a new Coordinates object with the data.
      Parameters:
      element - the XML element containing the Coordinates data.
      Returns:
      a new Coordinates object with the extracted data.
      Throws:
      InputException - if the extracted data is invalid.

    • getPerson

      private Person getPerson(Element element) throws InputException
      Returns a new Person object parsed from the input Element.
      Parameters:
      element - the input Element to be parsed.
      Returns:
      a new Person object.
      Throws:
      InputException - if the height is greater than 350 or the passport ID is not exactly 6 characters long.

    • getLocation

      private Location getLocation(Element element)
      Returns a new Location object parsed from the input Element.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a new Location object.

    • getTagValue

      private String getTagValue(String tag, Element element)
      Returns the value of a specified tag from the input Element.
      Parameters:
      tag - the name of the tag.
      element - the input Element to search for the tag in.
      Returns:
      the value of the specified tag.
